product_name: Salomon XA Pro 2 Trail-Running Shoes - Kids' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The kids' Salomon XA Pro 2 Trail-Running Shoes offer plenty of adventure-ready performance in a kid-size package. They're great for running and quick hikes. Breathable nylon mesh uppers feature synthetic leather overlays that wrap and secure insteps for a precise fit. Quickfit(TM) lacing system takes just a single pull for a precise fit; small pocket stows laces neatly away. Protective toe caps guard against bumps and abrasion. EVA insoles and midsoles absorb shock and provide cushion underfoot. Nonmarking Contagrip(R) rubber outsoles on the kids' Salomon XA Pro 2 Trail-Running Shoes deliver traction on mixed terrain. Closeout.
short_description: The kids' Salomon XA Pro 2 Trail-Running Shoes offer plenty of adventure-ready performance in a kid-size package. They're great for running and quick hikes.
